entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8 except plus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8 except plus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow or rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
